column4: I have been visiting this channel, looking for an answer. I hope someone, one day, answer my question: I have programs and gnome session segfault, I want to know what to do!
this is a complex issue that is not better addressed in realtime support, that suits better quick issues. Try asking for help in ubuntuforums.org
if Dr Willis want to help, I will try that!
if you want my advice, please, describe your problem in ubuntuforums.org
